title: Find Profitable Keywords FAST on KDP

tactics.name: incognito keyword research
tactics.description: Use incognito mode with keyword tools to eliminate search bias and uncover hidden keywords
steps: Install and enable Keywords Everywhere, AMZ Suggestion Expander, and Publisher Rocket in incognito
Capture keywords with search volume and niche potential
caveats: Avoid overly competitive terms like 'adult coloring book'
source_quotes: Using an incognito window wipes that slate clean and it's as if you're going to Amazon for the first time

tactics.name: Alphabetical Keyword Niche Down
tactics.description: Generate keywords by systematically exploring each letter of the alphabet to identify low-competition, high-volume niches.
steps: Type each letter of the alphabet into the search bar
Filter for keywords with 1,000+ monthly searches
Skip overly competitive terms like 'activity book for kids'
source_quotes: "You're going to come straight back to 'A'..."

tactics.name: keyword_niching
tactics.description: Refine broad keywords into specific niches with higher search volume and moderate competition
steps: Use Publisher Rocket to identify keyword variations
Filter by search volume > 500 and competition score < 50
Check Best Sellers Rank and monthly sales data
caveats: Avoid keywords with less than 100 monthly searches
source_quotes: 'Valentine activity book for kids'... almost 600 searches'

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Down
tactics.description: Refine broad keywords into specific niches with higher search volume and lower competition.
caveats: Avoid overly niche keywords with low search volume
source_quotes: 'Easter coloring book Christian,' and that was 970.'

tactics.name: Market Expansion
tactics.description: Test UK/DE markets by adjusting keyword spelling for regional variations.
caveats: Requires separate account setup for UK/DE
source_quotes: 'We'll just go ahead and switch over and we'll just type in, let's say, Easter.'

heuristics.name: volume-based filtering
heuristics.condition: If search volume is below 1,000, prioritize for niche potential
source_quotes: Easter coloring book—1,600 searches per month

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Threshold
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is yellow (moderately competitive), prioritize for low-content books
source_quotes: "Yellow is moderately competitive... totally okay for low-content books"

heuristics.name: competition_filter
heuristics.condition: If competition score is below 20, prioritize for investigation
source_quotes: 'competitive score here, so this is definitely one that I'm going to want to check out'

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Filter
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is below 45, prioritize keyword

claims.statement: Keywords Everywhere offers 100,000 credits for $10, cheaper than AMZ Suggestion Expander's $15/month
source_quotes: Keywords Everywhere is just cheaper. You pay 10 bucks once...

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket displays up to 1,200 competitors but first-page results are the only relevant metric
source_quotes: "You're really only competing with the books that show up on the first page..."

claims.statement: Books with Best Sellers Rank under 100,000 are considered strong performers
source_quotes: 'Anything a hundred thousand or under is pretty good'

claims.statement: Trademark checks are recommended for keywords with potential market demand
source_quotes: 'make sure that there are no pending trademark applications'

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket now supports UK and DE market analysis.
source_quotes: 'Publisher Rocket recently added the German and the UK markets.'

niche_patterns.description: Combine trending social media concepts with physical product use cases
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Captures niche demand from digital trends
source_quotes: Book talk journal is a place where you can record the different books that you have read

niche_patterns.description: Targets specific demographics with unique challenges and limitations
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with niche specificity for lower competition
source_quotes: "Low-content books can be created very quickly..."

niche_patterns.description: Combine seasonal relevance with specific audience and thematic elements
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages timely demand with targeted demographics
